name: Robot Dream
description:
Robot Dream is a short platform game that is part of the Cosmorama series.

This was the reason the protagonist of Cosmorama is a robot, because the 2D prefab in Unity is a robot. This game is very simple but don't judge it too fast, It is very easy to fall or to throw the crates away, so good luck! 

Can you reach the end? There is no real reward other than the satisfaction of reaching the end, but I warn you, it's no easy task!

This game was developed with Unity.

Move with the arrows and jump with space. If you throw a needed crate away, you will need to die!

Go back to Cosmorama
